group.headline: HeLLsGamers
group.summary:
HeLLsGamers is a Multi-Gaming Community that has been Growing since August 5,2005.

We have many different high performance (2000FPS) servers ranging from (but not limited to) CSS, TF2, BC2, COD7, L4D, L4D2, KF, GMOD & DODS. In total we have around 36 servers, Most ranked by gameME & EA Sponsors: SoftLayer, gameME & End of Reality

We like to Thank everyone that Helps Support HG! Visit www.HeLLsGamers.com

Banned for a strange reason or unjustly? Post an unban request! @ http://hellsgamers.com/unban

Major League Killers has been a clan since 2000. We have played on multiple gaming fronts, and even within our clan many people play various games. Major League Killers is a clan comprised of players diverse in age, origin and skill all sharing one common goal of brotherhood, sportsmanship and most of all a great gaming experience. Thus, we are threefold: a family, a gaming community, and a clan. We take pride and fun in any front we compete, pug, or pub in. Good Luck and Have Fun!!


CS:S GG5 Server: 69.28.220.60:27015

group.headline: [XpC] Clan Xeno's Community Group
group.summary:
{Xeno} Public Community [XpC]

Speak No Evil

Hear No Evil

Xeno Evil

Feel free to join our public group, it's open to everyone! If you would like to support our community and our server, please feel free to use the tag [XpC] in your steam name :)

Please do not use the {Xeno} tag that is for Clan Xeno members only. Otherwise you risk being banned from our servers.

Visit our forums to be part of the community or apply to join. We are always recruiting friendly, mature people.

TF2 servers:

2Fort ONLY {Xeno} [HLStatsx]

[Xeno]HC SND 24/7. IP 63.211.221.7

group.headline: Unleash the darker side of gaming!
group.summary:
TBNGC servers are provided by je-gameservers.co.uk and je-voiceservers.co.uk use promo code TBNGCPFC3 for free server setups, 100% uptime and support whenever you need it. Feel free to wear [TBNGC] in your name if you like us.

We aim to expand to the United States and Australia. Please support us by purchasing a gameserver.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Find out more about us at http://www.tbngc.co.uk/

group.headline: Let the Good Times Roll and the Alcohol Flow
group.summary:
Connect 207.88.210.155:27015

THE DRINKING GAME


1. If you are playing--------------------------------------------------------------Put a * to the left of your name
2. If you get killed (by someone with a *)-------------------------------------Two drinks
3. If you suicide/die--------------------------------------------------------------Two drinks
4. If your team wins--------------------------------------------------------------Two drinks
5. If your team loses-------------------------------------------------------------Four drinks
6. If you go AFK any reason-----------------------------------------------------Two drinks
7. If you get humiliated----------------------------------------------------------Four drinks
8. If you kill someone------------------------------------------------------------BRAG AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE

the above drinks are for beer drinkers....if you are doing shots of liquor then cut it in half.

group.headline: Democratic Republic of Semera (1st Division of Calone)
group.summary:

group.headline: What's that Sandvich? Welcome?
group.summary:
We support douchebag free gaming. Come in and stay awhile.
Current TF2 Community Servers
============================
These servers are 24 slots with 2 invisible reserved slots (for donators!) and have a standard rotation with map voting, nominations, rtv, and alltalk.
* Chicago SlayBox I: 69.175.33.150:27015
* Chicago SlayBox II: 216.52.143.85:27015

Fun Servers
============================
* Benny's TF2Ware/FortWars/SaxtonMod: critsandvich.com:27017
* Benny's Trading Post: critsandvich.com:27019

We don't cheat our server numbers, so people have to join for them to pop. Dislike events? help us pop our servers. 4pm weekdays and 10am weekends/holidays. Just join up at those times! As soon as they fill up they stay full until late at night.

///////////////////////////////////////////////////
Please, check out our website and forums! We're always looking for more voices for our community, and you'll get heard on http://critsandvich.com
//////////////////////////////////////////////////

The community starts with you. Support us by wearing the CSn| tag. (Example: CSn| Some Guy or Some Guy |CSn)
Or take it a step further. Become a donor and get some kick ass perks! (All our perks are non-gamechanging.)
For a complete list of donor perks, visit our website. (link below.)

On a kick ass match team? Support CSn| Need a server? Apply for sponsorship in our forums!!
Make sure to check out our match servers:
TF2 Competitive/Training Servers

critsandvich.com:27018 Death match Server
critsandvich.com:27016 Match Server
critsandvich.com:27024 MGE Training

Left 4 Dead 2
critsandvich.com:27015 co-op "fun" server
